posts.content:
Esya 2018 was held at IIIT Delhi from 17th-18th August. The results were as follows:

Congratulations to all the winners!

posts.classes: post-9424 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-elite-2 category-uncategorized
posts.title: e-Lite 2018 Creative Event Qualifiers
posts.content:
The e-Lite 2018 Creative Event was held from 24 April 2018 to 13 May 2018. The following students have qualified (in no particular order):

  • Gopal Krishna Halder (9-J)
  • Tejas Chaudhary (9-F)
  • Kshitiz (10-H)
  • Rudraneel Sinha (9-J)
  • Simarjiv Singh (11-Q)
  • Pulan Pattnaik (11-H)
  • Jaysal Manchanda (7-J)
  • Aryaman Chandra (9-M)
  • Kabir Mathur (6-F)
  • Arunim Gupta (12-I)
  • Pulkit Garg (9-F)

Congratulations to all the qualifiers!
posts.author: Kabir Goel
